name: The Shadow's Game
description:
The Shadow's Game is a game I made alongside a team of close friends in my program for our end of first year project made with Cocos2d-x. In The Shadow's Game you are to use your platforming and puzzle solving skills to complete each level and beat the game! By using your unique ability to control your shadow and have interact with the shadow world objects you can solve each puzzle and level. Try not to get attacked by the monsters, if they kill you, you will have to restart the level!

Game can be played with a keyboard or an Xbox One Controller
